articles.title: Why quantum-computing stocks may be the Trump White House’s next investment - MarketWatch
articles.description: The U.S. government is reportedly considering quantum investments. The technology holds promise, but there have been practical roadblocks.
articles.content:
Theyve been some of the years most speculative plays. Now the U.S. government might be getting in on the action.

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: OpenAI’s Atlas is more about ChatGPT than the web - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI's new browser is a surface for the company to distribute ChatGPT and develop new AI features rather than improving core web experience.
articles.content: OpenAI unveiled its AI browser, ChatGPT Atlas, during a livestream on Tuesday. There are other AI browsers such as The Browser Company’s Dia, Opera’s Neon, Perplexity’s Comet, and General Catalyst-ba… [+5003 chars]
